verses.verse: Now it happened in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H476>Elishama,<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H4410>royal<s%> and one of the chief <S%H7227>officers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H935>him,<s%> came to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah;<s%> and there they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H4708>Mizpah.<s%>

Then <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> who were with <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H4428>him,<s%> whom the king of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> also <S%H5221>killed<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were with <S%H1436>him,<s%> with Gedaliah, at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who were <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H582>there,<s%> the men of <S%H4421>war.<s%>
It happened the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> after he had <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> and no <S%H376>man<s%> knew <S%H3045>it,<s%>

that there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> from <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> from <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and from <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> even <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> having their <S%H2206>beards<s%> <S%H1548>shaved<s%> and their <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>torn,<s%> and having <S%H1413>cut<s%> <S%H4503>themselves,<s%> with meal offerings and <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1058>them,<s%> weeping all <S%H1980>along<s%> as he <S%H1980>went:<s%> and it <S%H6298>happened,<s%> as he met <S%H559>them,<s%> he said to <S%H935>them,<s%> Come to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam.<s%>

It was <S%H935>so,<s%> when they came into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H8432>them,<s%> and cast them into the midst of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> <S%H582>he,<s%> and the men who were with him.

But <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> among those who <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H4191>Don't<s%> kill <S%H3426>us;<s%> for we have <S%H4301>stores<s%> hidden in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and of <S%H1706>honey.<s%> So he <S%H2308>stopped,<s%> and <S%H4191>didn't<s%> kill them <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

Now the <S%H953>pit<s%> in which <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> all the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> whom he had <S%H5221>killed,<s%> by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> (the same was who which <S%H609>Asa<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>), <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> it with those who were <S%H2491>killed.<s%>

Then <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were in <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> even the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H7604>remained<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> whom <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had <S%H6485>committed<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam;<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> carried them away <S%H7617>captive,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%> to go <S%H5674>over<s%> to the children of <S%H1121>Ammon.<s%>

But when <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> who were with <S%H8085>him,<s%> heard of all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> had <S%H6213>done,<s%>

then they <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him by the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are in <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%>

Now it happened <S%H5971>that,<s%> when all the people who were with <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> who were with <S%H8055>him,<s%> then they were glad.

So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> had carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> and came <S%H3212>back,<s%> and went to <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah.<s%>

But <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> with <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to the children of <S%H1121>Ammon.<s%>

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> who were with <S%H7611>him,<s%> all the remnant of the <S%H5971>people<s%> whom he had <S%H7725>recovered<s%> from <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> <S%H1397>the<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>children,<s%> and the <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> whom he had brought <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon:<s%>

and they <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and lived <S%H3427>in<s%> <S%H1628>Geruth<s%> <S%H3643>Chimham,<s%> which is <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

<S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> for they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H3458>them,<s%> because Ishmael the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> had <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land.<s%>
